name: Orb (itch) (Sfowl)
description:
collect orbs

you can jump while remaining in a roll, forgot to explain that

make sure the browser is wide enough or zoomed out enough so that the screen is fully visible

made for the 48-hour 2018 Veteran's Day Game Jam for the Cal Poly Game Development club. The theme was "cyclical".

Credits

A game by Dan Batiste and some other guy

Music

Hard Boiled - Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) - Licensed under Create Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Other thing

Character controller and animations were taken from a previous project and the foundation for the character controller's collisions and movement was created using Sebastian Lague's youtube tutorial series on platformer controllers.
